text: During the 1959–60 season Hibernian, a football club based in Edinburgh, came seventh out of 18 clubs in the Scottish First Division. ==Scottish First Division== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! Joe Baker scored a hat-trick for Hibs in a 6-6 draw. ==See also== *List of Hibernian F.C. seasons ==References== ==External links== *Hibernian 1959/1960 results and fixtures, Soccerbase Category:Hibernian F.C. seasons Hibernian
